subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adam Everett hit a two-run home run off Bob Howry in the eighth inning to lead the Houston Astros past the Chicago Cubs, 5-3, in the Wrigley Field home debuts of Manager Lou Piniella and center fielder Alfonso Soriano.
snippet: Adam Everett hit a two-run home run off Bob Howry in the eighth inning to lead the Houston Astros past the Chicago Cubs, 5-3, in the Wrigley Field home debuts of Manager Lou Piniella and center fielder Alfonso Soriano.
